AWAKENING THE KUNDALINI TO TANTRA
Pilates For Everybody
177 Post Road West
Westport, Ct 06880

The Kundalini System, , often depicted as a snake, is utilized in Tantra as the pathway to joy, pleasure and the ecstasy. Our energy centers, or chakras, are located along the Kundalini System. In Tantra we harness the energy found in our chakras and move it along the Kundalini system to reach a heightened self awareness and connection with others and love.

In the Eastern philosophy of Kundalini Yoga, vital energy lies at the base of the spine and may be channeled upward through the body to the brain. Lee Sanella, an author and medical doctor, has researched this vital energy, or Awakening Kundalini. He found that releasing this energy from the base of the spine to the brain causes the nervous system to throw off stress and stimulates feelings of liberty, expansion, joy and pleasure.

During this workshop the ASHIMORE CENTER will be focusing on the Kundalini System and the energy centers. We will start by opening our chakras through yoga. The Ashimore Center is pleased to host Greg Barringer as our yogic facilitator.

Pam and Yanni, of the Ashimore Center, will lead the group in Tantric exercises designed to stream our vital energy and experience the vibrations of these sensations throughout the body.

Pam and Yanni have been practicing teaching Tantra for nearly 20 years. They have studied with Margot Anand, Jelle Bode and the Skydancing Institute. Greg Barringer has been teaching and practicing yoga for nearly 20 years. Hi work is primarily influenced by the lineage of Swami Shri Kripalvandji.

Cost: $58.00 per person
